Room.Name: Lost in a Vast Sea
Room.ShortDescription: You are swimming strongly in the Respitial Sea near a boat and a raft.
Room.LongDescription: A decrepit old boat swings at anchor nearby and you can see a friendly wave from a person standing near the rail. Not far from the boat is a large raft, also anchored. The raft appears to be quite comfortable and has a canvas sunshade over most of its deck. There doesn't seem to be anyone aboard the raft.
